llm_topic_proposal_raw.motivation: The article highlights the emerging importance of Generative Engine Optimization (GEO) and Answer Engine Optimization (AEO) in digital marketing, which are critical for brands to enhance visibility in AI-generated search results, warranting a new atomic node.
llm_topic_proposal_raw.name: Generative Engine Optimization and Answer Engine Optimization

topic_category.motivation: Emerging marketing strategy reshaping search behavior and brand visibility, influencing macro-level digital discovery trends.
